mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_NO , A.USER_NM FROM TB_EMP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVLF B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE B.EMP_NO IS NULL AND A.DEPART_CD = 'T00'

SELECT A.SVLF_NO , A.SVLF_BGNG_DT , A.SVLF_DDLB_DT , A.SVLF_NM , A.SVLF_CN , A.SVLF_DT , A.EMP_NO , A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD , B.USER_NM , C.LECTURE_ROOM_NM FROM TB_SVLF A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LECTURE_ROOM C ON A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD = C.LECTURE_ROOM_CD WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND (A.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= SYSDATE AND A.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= SYSDATE) ORDER BY A.SVLF_BGNG_DT DESC

/* team.tttt.pms.mapper.SvlfMapper.noSvlfList */ SELECT A.SVLF_NO, A.SVLF_BGNG_DT, A.SVLF_DDLB_DT, A.SVLF_NM, A.SVLF_CN, A.SVLF_DT, A.EMP_NO, A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD, B.USER_NM, C.LECTURE_ROOM_NM FROM TB_SVLF A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LECTURE_ROOM C ON A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD = C.LECTURE_ROOM_CD WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND A.SVLF_NO NOT IN ( SELECT SVLF_NO FROM TB_SVLF WHERE A.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= SYSDATE AND A.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= SYSDATE ) ORDER BY A.SVLF_BGNG_DT DESC

/* team.tttt.pms.mapper.SvlfMapper.roomList */ SELECT A.LECTURE_ROOM_NM , A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD FROM TB_LECTURE_ROOM A WHERE A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD NOT IN ( SELECT B.LECTURE_ROOM_CD FROM TB_SVLF B WHERE (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= #{svlfBgngDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= #{svlfBgngDt}) OR (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= #{svlfDdlbDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= #{svlfDdlbDt}) OR (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT >= #{svlfBgngDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT <= #{svlfDdlbDt}) ) ORDER BY A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD ASC

/* team.tttt.pms.mapper.SvlfMapper.roomList */ SELECT A.EMP_NO , A.USER_NM FROM TB_EMP A WHERE A.EMP_NO NOT IN ( SELECT B.EMP_NO FROM TB_SVLF B WHERE (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= #{svlfBgngDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= #{svlfBgngDt}) OR (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT <= #{svlfDdlbDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT >= #{svlfDdlbDt}) OR (B.SVLF_BGNG_DT >= #{svlfBgngDt} AND B.SVLF_DDLB_DT <= #{svlfDdlbDt}) ) AND A.DEPART_CD = 'T00' ORDER BY A.EMP_NO ASC

/* team.tttt.pms.mapper.SvlfMapper.svlfInfo */ SELECT A.SVLF_NO , A.SVLF_BGNG_DT , A.SVLF_DDLB_DT , A.SVLF_NM , A.SVLF_CN , A.SVLF_DT , A.EMP_NO , A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD , B.USER_NM , C.lecture_room_NM FROM TB_SVLF A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lecture_room C ON A.LECTURE_ROOM_CD = C.LECTURE_ROOM_CD WHERE A.SVLF_NO = #{svlfNo}
